person.name: Firas Abbas
person.about: Software Engineer, part-time developer, fulltime learner.
person.bio: I am **Firas Abbas** software engineer from Lebanon. I have a BS in Computer Science from the *Lebanese International University*. I was also double majoring in Computer and Communication Engineering at the American University of Science and Technology. I enjoy coding and programming and due to years of coding experience in many programming languages, I am capable on learning and adapting new technologies on demand. I'd love to **work remotely full or part time** on web and mobile applications.
